title: Easy street [Music version]
brief_description: The Tramp, played by Chaplin, reformed by angelic Edna Purviance, joins the police force and his first job is to tame the local bully (Eric Campbell). Also features Albert Austin and Henry Bergman. Musical score by Winston S. Sharples. No spoken word or intertitles - music soundtrack only.
